# nix_drv (Data Source)

Evaluate a derivation.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    nix = {
      source  = "terraform.mtoohey.com/nix/nix"
      version = "0.3.0"
    }
  }
}

data "nix_drv" "hello" {
  flake_ref = ".#hello"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `flake_ref` (String) The flake reference to build.

### Read-Only

- `out_path` (String) The store path produced by the derivation.
